local_intent: Align to bread, compute pinch grasp pose, and verify grasp pose availability.
assumptions: Camera has line of sight to bread
coherence_with_global: Uses DetectObject -> MoveAbove -> ApproachAndAlign -> ComputeGraspPose (pinch, result_key=grasp_bread) and verifies with PoseAvailable, matching GLOBAL_BT semantics around the active leaf.
